tossup_question: -   –  The precession of Mercury’s orbit, which cannot be explained via a classical approach, is explained by what theory or principle?
tossup_answer: ANSWER: GENERAL THEORY OF RELATIVITY (ACCEPT: GENERAL RELATIVITY)
bonus_question: -   –  Identify all of the following 4 heat engine cycles which use internal combustion: 1) Diesel; 2) Carnot; 3) Otto; 4) Rankine.
